en.today: The day gets off to a punchy start, dearest Aries, as the Leo full moon rises and squares chaotic Uranus. Heads will butt as stubborn temperaments flare, though it will be vital that you keep your ego in check. On the plus side, you could experience breakthroughs that bring you closer to manifesting abundance. Don't believe everything you hear when Mercury becomes agitated, and avoid getting sucked into gossip mills. Connect with your body and find ways to alleviate stress once the moon enters Virgo this evening. Close out the day with a relaxing meditation to further relax the mind, body, and spirit.

en.today: The full moon rises in your sign this morning, dearest Leo, helping you feel inspired, confident, and capable. Unfortunately, unexpected roadblocks could test your patience due to a harsh t-square with disruptive Uranus. Stay on your toes while navigating this astrological event, trusting that your unique brand of genius can help you overcome any obstacles. Rely on your instincts when Mercury becomes agitated, but consider bouncing ideas off a more level-headed companion to find the perfect balance. Break ground on your latest schemes once Luna enters Virgo this evening, inspiring you to work for your manifestation aspirations.

en.today: Imbalances are placed under a cosmic microscope today, dearest Taurus, as the Leo full moon intensifies the duality of your work and home life. A harsh t-square with Uranus may cause you to feel overburdened by the demands of your career and family, putting you in flight or fight mode. If you need space to recalibrate, be sure to take it with the intention of finding solutions. People may seem unsympathetic to your cause when Mercury becomes agitated, so choose your audience wisely when sharing vulnerabilities. You'll feel more confident and in the mood for fun once evening emerges, and Luna enters Virgo.

en.today: Your curiosity could lead you down some strange and unpredictable paths, dearest Gemini, as the Leo full moon rises. A harsh t-square with Uranus makes it easy to get distracted or misled, so you must proceed with a skeptical and clear mind. Don't hesitate to ask questions, but give yourself time to digest the answers you receive fully. Connect with your spirituality with or without a specific intention once Mercury stirs, and messages could pour through. Slow down and embrace your favorite wellness practices from home as evening sets in and Luna migrates into health-oriented Virgo.
